summary: Frontend-side diagnostics, guarded actor calls, and user-facing error normalization were added. However, the diff shows no backend Motoko changes, so restoring missing canister functions / Candid parity is not evidenced. The REQ-11 “reproduce and capture exact runtime errors” outcome is also not evidenced; the added doc describes a diagnostics approach and generic patterns but does not capture actual observed console errors from the deployed app.

missing_requirements.requirement: Identify which backend canister functions are reported as “missing” after the latest deployment by reproducing the issue in the running app and capturing the exact console/runtime errors, producing a clear list of missing/broken functions and reproduction steps.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff adds a diagnostics utility and a documentation file with generic guidance and a table marked as all methods present, but it does not include captured real console/runtime error strings from an actual reproduction, nor a confirmed list of actually-missing functions from the latest deployment.
